entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued August 17 at 11:52AM AKDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...Rising Water Levels on Rivers Draining the Brooks Range... Several weather fronts moving across the Brooks Range will bring rising water levels to rivers and streams. entry.cap:areaDesc: Northeastern Brooks Range
